record.title: DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY NEXT
record.narrative:
DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY NEXT -- (House of Representatives - December 06, 2007)

[Page: H14448]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: LEE
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the business in order under the Calendar Wednesday rule be dispensed with on Wednesday next.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
